title: Downtown Lisle 2 bed 1 bath
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
2 bed 1 bath apartment for rent in the heart of downtown Lisle, located 2 blocks from the train station and less than 1 mile from 88 and 355 tollways.
Fantastic location with in unit washer/dryer and a private balcony.
Please message if interested for more information or to schedule a showing.
